Pre-Game Insights: West Indies captain Rovman Powell believes that the side is all geared up to face a familiar England side in their Super 8 fixture on June 20 in the 2024 T20 World Cup.
Powell highlighted their familiarity with this England side due to previous series
Others: Both England and West Indies faced off against each other in a highly competitive T20I series in December 2023, which saw Powell's side clinch a decisive series win after the very last match.
